## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/valid">ValID</a> - Represents a reference of a definition of some sort with no type.

There are several cases where we have to parse the value but where the type can depend on later context. This may either be a numeric reference or a symbolic (var) reference. This is just a discriminated union.

Definition at line 53 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/asmparser/llparser-h">LLParser.h</a>.
